stories.title: Add CLI security/quarantine commands
stories.description: Implement skillsctl security scan and quarantine list/approve/block commands, and add unit tests for security check flow.
acceptance: skillsctl security scan <skill-path> runs ACIP scan and prints findings
skillsctl quarantine list shows pending items
skillsctl quarantine approve <id> marks item approved
Unit tests cover security check flow and quarantine state transitions
stories.notes: Added skillsctl security scan + quarantine commands; tests cover ACIP scan flow and quarantine state transitions.

stories.title: Expand integration tests
stories.description: Add end-to-end workflow coverage for create→validate→approve→publish, quarantine, search, and cross-platform sync.
acceptance: Integration tests cover ACIP quarantine flow
Integration tests cover search indexing and queries

stories.title: Finalize docs
stories.description: Update AGENTS/DocC/migration/security notes and README for new CLI commands.
acceptance: AGENTS.md updated with new CLI commands
DocC comments added for new public APIs
